title: Effects of tuning decision trees in random forest regression on predicting porosity of a hydrocarbon reservoir. A case study: volve oil field, north sea
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, 3,2335-2347
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00313F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Kushan Sandunil, Ziad Bennour, Hisham Ben Mahmud, Ausama Giwelli
This study investigates the effects of tuning n_estimators along with max_features and min_samples_leaf in random forest regression when predicting the porosity of the Volve oil field.
